member.name: M:WinCopies.IO.File.IsDuplicate(System.IO.Stream@,System.IO.Stream@,System.Int32@,System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Determines whether two files are duplicates by checking their size and content. For the exceptions that can occur, see the doc of the stream class that you use.
member.param: The buffer length to use to read data.
A delegate that is raised after each data block has been checked. If the returned value is , then the process is stopped.
member.returns: if the two files are duplicates; if the process has been canceled; otherwise .
